Really glad to hear the gentleman who needed assistance at the @JamTarts game earlier today has been discharged from hospital. I’m told he has an epeleptic fit, distressing as it looked, he’s okay now. Thanks to the first responding serving army officer for his calmness.❤️👏

Lunch, face painting, prizes, tunes from @shieldsent1 (book him!) fun with @bighearts a fantastic win rounded off with captain Christophe Berra and @JohnSouttar signing autographs. Delighted to be presenting today in the Gorgie Suite at the @JamTarts Kids Club. There’s music from @shieldsent1 , competitions with @bighearts first team players popping in and Jock the Jambo coming to see us! Laughs over lunch is the plan then the game vs @ICTFC ! #monthehearts https://t.co/DXUlV94kdE
@CalumMack1 Haha! You too mate what a cracking night! Played out my skin in goal today so I must go out more often! 😂😂😂

Great effort from everyone playing football at the @HibsOfficial training centre today. Good of Neil Lennon to get up and say a few words too. It was to support mental health charities and drive awareness of it being okay not be okay. Well done all! Our team lost in the semi! 😭 https://t.co/s810CIvgn7

Up and about to play in a football tournament with @Davidknox2012 to highlight it’s okay not to be okay sometimes. Delighted to be asked and can’t wait to see how our team get on in a kickabout for a great cause. ❤️😍🙈⚽️ https://t.co/sCv77Di6H1

So Friday has ended in a random night partying at @atikedinburgh with @CraigGoodyear (only two left from our group!) What a great laugh and why not, It’s Friday!! Tunes galore! (I prefer the cheesy music room to be honest! Get some boy and girl bands on!)🙈😂👏👌 https://t.co/4zCrcq2W53
